titles.disable-animated-transitions-during-vide: Disable animated transitions during video mixing
titles.this-mode-encodes-the-video-and-audio-in: This mode encodes the video and audio into chunks, which are shared with multiple viewers. Limited browser support. Can potentially reduce CPU and improve video quality, but will rely on a buffer.
titles.the-guest-will-not-see-their-own-self-pr: Gonbidatuak gelara sartzean ezingo dute beraien aurrebista ikusi
titles.guests-will-have-an-option-to-poke-the-d: Gonbidatuak zuzendaria mugitzeko aukera dute botoia sakatuz
titles.add-an-equalizer-to-the-guest-s-micropho: Zuzendariak kontrolatu dezaken ekualizatzilea gehitu gonbidatuaren mikrofonoari
titles.show-some-prep-suggestions-to-the-guests: Gonbidatuak batzean erakutsi prestaketa iradokizun batzuk
titles.have-screen-shares-stream-id-s-use-a-pre: Have screen-shares stream ID's use a predictable prefixed value instead of a random one.

titles.use-meshcast-servers-to-restream-video-d: Use Meshcast servers to restream video data from this guest to its viewers, reducing the CPU and upload load in some cases. Will increase latency a bit.

titles.show-an-ovelaid-grid-on-the-guest-s-prev: Show an ovelaid grid on the guest's preview video to help with self-centering of the guest.

titles.the-guest-s-microphone-will-be-muted-on-: Gonbidatuen mikrofonoak mututa hasiko dira gelara batutakoan. Gonbidatuek piztu ditzateke.
titles.have-the-guest-join-muted-so-only-the-di: Gonbidatua batzerakoan mututa hasiko da, zuzendariak baimendu arte
titles.the-guest-will-not-be-asked-for-a-video-: Gonbidatuari ez zaio kamera eskatuko konektatzerakoan
titles.make-the-invite-url-encoded-so-parameter: Make the invite URL encoded, so parameters are harder to tinker with by guests. This also debrands the interface and gives it a new domain name.
titles.the-active-speakers-are-made-visible-aut: Hizlari aktiboak automatiko ikusgarri izango dira

titles.disable-fit-to-window-optmized-video-sca: Disable fit-to-window optmized video scaling for added sharpness; increases CPU / Network load though.

titles.video-packet-loss-indicator-of-video-pre: Video packet loss indicator of video preview; green is good, red is bad. Flame implies CPU is overloaded. May not reflect the packet loss seen by scenes or other guests.

titles.remotely-change-the-volume-of-this-guest: Remotely change the volume of this guest; updates on release. Dbl-click to reset.
titles.toggle-between-the-message-appearing-as-: Toggle between the message appearing as a large overlay and as normal chat
titles.move-the-user-to-another-room-controlled: Mugitu erabiltzailea beste gela batera, beste zuzendari baten gidaritzapean
titles.force-the-user-to-disconnect-they-can-al: Kaleratu erabiltzailea. Berriz battzeko aukera dauka.
titles.toggle-solo-voice-chat-or-hold-ctrl-cmd-: Toggle solo voice chat or hold CTRL/CMD when selecting to make it two-way private.
titles.solo-this-video-everywhere-hold-ctrl-cmd: Solo this video everywhere. (Hold CTRL/CMD to just make video larger)

innerHTML.copy-this-url: Kopiatu URL hau OBS iturri bilatzailean
innerHTML.only-director-can-hear-you: Momentu honetan zuzendariak bakarrik entzun zaitzake.
innerHTML.director-video-muted-you: The director has disabled your camera temporarily.
innerHTML.welcome-to-vdo-ninja-chat: Welcome! You can send text messages directly to connected peers from here.
innerHTML.click-here-for-help: Hemen klik egin laburpen azkarra ikusteko eta laguntza izateko
innerHTML.welcome-to-control-room:
Ongi etorri. Hau da talde berriketarako zuzendariaren kontrol gela.

Lagunekin talde berriketak egin ditzakezu gela bat erabiliz. Partekatu esteka urdina txatera automatikoki sartuko diren gonbidatuentzat.

Talde gelek dituzten mugak:
  • Talde gela batek 30 gonbidatu inguru har ditzake, faktore ugariren arabera, besteak beste, CPU eta gelako gonbidatu guztien banda zabalera kontuan hartuz. 7 lagun inguru baino gehiago elkartzeko, ziurrenik nahiago duzu desgaitu bideoen partekatzea gonbidatuen artean. Using &broadcast, &roombitrate=0 or &bideoen aukerak dira hemen.
  • Bideoak kalitate baxukoak izango dira nahita gonbidatuentzat eta zuzendarientzat; banda zabalera eta CPU baliabideak aurrezteko. Hala ere, kalitate handikoa izango da OBS barruan.
  • Eszenen egoera, esaterako, eszena batean aktibo dauden bideoak galtzen dira zuzendariak kontrol gela edo eszena berrezartzen duenean.

    • Nota gehigarriak:

  • Gonbidatutako bideo bakoitzaren ikustaldietarako estekak bideoen azpian ikusten dira kargatu ahala. Hauek OBS iturrien arakatzailean erabil daitezke.
  • Nahasteko taldeko eszenak, esteka berdeak, erabil ditzakezu automatikoki antolatzeko bideoak OBSn.
  • Kontrol gela hau bideo edo audio stream isolatuak grabatzeko erabil dezakezu, baina oraindik ezaugarri esperimentala da.
  • Gonbidatu bat gela batetik bestera mugitzen baduzu, ez dute jakingo zein gelara aldatu diren.
  • OBSk gonbidatuen bideoa kalitate handian ikusiko du; bideo bit tasa lehenetsia 2500 kbps da. Bit tasa altuagoak ezartzeak mugimendua hobetuko du.
  • VP8 bideo kodek lehenetsia izan ohi da, baina erabiltzen duen &codec=vp9 or &codec=h264 OBS-en URLak hondatutako bideo-arazoak murrizten lagun dezake.
  • &stereo=2 can be added to guests to turn off audio effects, such as echo cancellation and noise-reduction.
  • https://invite.cam gonbidatuei emandako gonbidapen esteka baten URL parametroak ezkutatzen lagun dezakeen doako zerbitzua da.
  • Adding &showonly=SOME_OBS_VIRTUALCAM gonbidatuentzako gonbidapen estekek bideo bakarra ikusteko aukera ematen die gonbidatuei; hau, adibidez, OBS Kamera Birtualaren irteera izan daiteke

    • URL aukera eta parametro aurreratuetarako, Wikian ikusi.

innerHTML.added-notes:
Aholku garrantzitsuak:
  • Parte-hartzaileen artean bideoa ez partekatzeak emanaldiaren kalitatea hobetzen du.
  • Gonbidatu soilik ezagutzen dituzun pertsonak.
  • "Grabaketa" aukera esperimentala da oraingoz.

placeholders.enter-the-remote-obs-password-here: Enter the remote OBS password here

miscellaneous.submit-error-report: Sakatu OK VDO.Ninja-ra akatsen erregistroak bidaltzeko. Akatsen erregistroek informazio pribatua izan ditzakete.
miscellaneous.director-redirect-1: Zuzendariak URL honetara bideratu nahi zaitu:
miscellaneous.audio-processing-disabled: Gonbidatu honekin audio prozesatzea kenduta dago. Ezin da isildu edo bolumena aldatu
miscellaneous.not-the-director: <font color='red'>Ez zara gela honetako zuzendaria. Kontrolik gabe egongo zara. Zuzendariak alde egitean, gela erreklamatzen saia zaitezke.</font>
miscellaneous.room-is-claimed:
Gelara sartu den lehenengo pertsona da zuzendaria.

Eskatu irteteko eta berritu orrialdea
miscellaneous.token-room-is-claimed:
The room is claimed by someone else.

Join as a guest or co-director instead.
miscellaneous.room-is-claimed-codirector:
The room is already claimed by someone else.

Trying to join as a co-director...
miscellaneous.streamid-already-published:
Argitaratzen ari zaren stream IDa dagoeneko erabiltzen ari dira.

Saiatu beste gonbidapen esteka batekin edo berritu berriro saiatzeko.

Deskonektatuta izango zara.
miscellaneous.room-test-not-good:
"Test" gelaren izena oso erabilia da eta agian ez da segurua.

Ziur zaude jarraitu nahi duzula?
miscellaneous.load-previous-session: Aurreko saioaren ezarpenak berrerabili nahi dituzu?
miscellaneous.enter-password:
Mesedez, sartu pasahitza behean: 

(Oharra: pasahitzek letra larriak eta xeheak bereizten dituzte eta ez zaizu ohartaraziko zuzena ez denean.)
miscellaneous.enter-password-2:
Mesedez, sartu pasahitza behean: 

(Oharra: pasahitzak maiuskulak eta minuskulak bereizten dituzte.)
miscellaneous.enter-director-password:
Sartu zuzendariaren pasahitza:

(Oharra: Pasahitzek letra xehe eta larriak desberdintzen dituzte, eta gaizki sartuz gero ez zaizu ohartaraziko.)
miscellaneous.enter-new-display-name: Idatzi stream honetan bistaratzeko izen berria
miscellaneous.what-bitrate: Zein bit tasatan grabatu nahi zenuke? (kbps)
miscellaneous.press-ok-to-record:
Sakatu OK grabatzen hasteko. Sakatu berriro gelditzeko eta deskargatzeko.

Abisua: mantendu aktibo arakatzailearen fitxa grabatzen jarraitzeko.

Nahi izanez gero, bideoaren bit tasa lehenetsia alda dezakezu behean (kbps)
miscellaneous.no-streamID-provided:
Ez da stream IDrik eman; ausazko bat sortuko da.

Stream ID:
miscellaneous.alphanumeric-only:
Informazioa: zenbakiak eta letrak soilik erabili behar dira stream IDan.

Karaktere iraingarriak azpimarra batez ordezkatu dira
miscellaneous.stream-id-too-long:
Stream IDak 45 karaktere alfanumeriko baino gutxiago izan behar ditu.

Luzera egokituko da.
miscellaneous.transfer-guest-to-room:
Bidali gonbidatuak gelara:

(Kontuan izan gelek pasahitz bera partekatu behar dutela)
miscellaneous.transfer-guest-to-url:
Bidali gonbidatuak beste helbide batera.

(Gonbidatuek onartu beharko dute)
miscellaneous.confirm-disconnect-users: Ziur zaude erabiltzaile horiek deskonektatu nahi dituzula?
miscellaneous.confirm-disconnect-user: Ziur zaude erabiltzaile hau deskonektatu nahi duzula?
miscellaneous.enter-new-codirector-password: Enter a co-director password to use
miscellaneous.volume-control: Volume control for local playback only
miscellaneous.signal-meter: Video packet loss indicator of video preview; green is good, red is bad. Flame implies CPU is overloaded. May not reflect the packet loss seen by scenes or other guests.
miscellaneous.waiting-for-the-stream: Waiting for the stream. Tip: Adding &cleanoutput to the URL will hide this spinner, or click to retry, which will also hide it.
miscellaneous.you-have-been-transferred: You've been transferred to a different room
miscellaneous.you-have-been-activated: The director has allowed you to see others in the room now
miscellaneous.you-are-no-longer-a-co-director: You are no longer a co-director as you were transferred.
miscellaneous.headphones-tip: Tip: Use headphones to avoid audio echo issues.
miscellaneous.camera-tip-c922: Tip: To achieve 60-fps with a C922 webcam, low-light compensation needs to be turned off, exposure set to auto, and 720p used.
miscellaneous.camera-tip-camlink: Tip: A Cam Link may glitch green/purple if accessed elsewhere while already in use.
miscellaneous.samsung-a-series: Samsung A-series phones may have issues with Chrome; if so, try Firefox Mobile instead or switch video codecs.
miscellaneous.screen-permissions-denied:
Permission to capture denied. Ensure your browser has screen record system permissions

1.On your Mac, choose Apple menu  > System Preferences, click Security & Privacy , then click Privacy.
2.Select Screen Recording.
3.Select the checkbox next to your browser to allow it to record your screen.
miscellaneous.change-audio-output-device:
Audio could not be captured. Please make sure you have an audio output device available.

Some gaming headsets (ie: Corsair) may need to be set to 2-channel output to work, as surround sound drivers may cause problems.
miscellaneous.prompt-access-request: is trying to view your stream. Allow them?
miscellaneous.confirm-reload-user: Are you sure you wish to reload this user's browser?
miscellaneous.webrtc-is-blocked:
⚠ This browser has either blocked WebRTC or does not support it.

This site will not work without it.

Disable any browser extensions or privacy settings that may be blocking WebRTC, or try a different browser.
miscellaneous.not-clean-session:
Video effects or canvas rendering failed.

Check to ensure any remotely hosted images are cross-origin allowed.
miscellaneous.ios-no-screen-share: Sorry, but your iOS browser does not support screen-sharing. Please see this guide for an alternative method to do so.
miscellaneous.android-no-screen-share: Sorry, your mobile browser does not support screen-sharing. The Android native app does offer basic support for it though.
miscellaneous.no-screen-share-supported:
Sorry, your browser does not support screen-sharing.

Please use the desktop versions of Firefox or Chrome instead.
miscellaneous.speech-not-suppoted: ⚠ Speech Recognition is not supported by this browser
miscellaneous.blue-yeti-tip: Tip: Blue Yeti microphones may experience issues being overly loud. Please see here for a solution or disable auto-gain in VDO.Ninja.
miscellaneous.site-not-responsive:
Notice: The system cannot be accessed or is currently slow to respond.

If a routing issue, try adding &proxy to the URL; you can also try https://proxy.vdo.ninja or a VPN if the service is blocked in your country. If the main service is down, a backup version is also available here: https://backup.vdo.ninja Contact steve@seguin.email for added help. This service requires the use of Websockets over port 443.
miscellaneous.no-audio-source-detected:
No Audio Source was detected.

If you were wanting to capture an Application's Audio, please see:
https://docs.vdo.ninja/help/guides-and-how-tos#audio for some guides.
miscellaneous.viewer-count: Total outbound p2p connections of this remote stream
miscellaneous.enter-url-for-widget: Enter a URL for a page to embed as a sidebar
miscellaneous.vision-disabled: The Director has disabled your vision temporarily
miscellaneous.invalid-remote-code:
Invalid remote control code.

Use the field below to try again with a different passcode.
miscellaneous.invalid-remote-code-obs:
Invalid remote control code.

The remote OBS system needs a matching passcode set using &remote.

See the documentation for help..
miscellaneous.request-rejected-obs:
The request was rejected.

The remote OBS system needs a matching passcode set using &remote.

See the documentation for help.
miscellaneous.remote-token-rejected: The remote request failed; the &remote token did not match or the remote user does not allow remote control.
miscellaneous.remote-peer-connected:
Remote peer connected to video stream.

Connection to handshake server being killed on request. This increases security, but the peer will not be able to reconnect automatically on connection failure.

Press OK to start the stream!
miscellaneous.director-denied: The main director denied you as a co-director
miscellaneous.only-main-director: Only the main director can transfer this guest
miscellaneous.request-failed: The request failed; you can't apply this action
miscellaneous.tokens-did-not-match: The remote request failed; the remote token did not match or the remote user does not allow remote control.
miscellaneous.token-not-director: The request failed; the remote user did not recognize you as the director
miscellaneous.approved-as-director: The director approved you as a co-director
miscellaneous.you-are-a-codirector: You are a co-director of this room; you have partial director control assigned to you.
miscellaneous.this-is-you:
This is you, a co-director.
You are also a performer.
miscellaneous.preview-meshcast-disabled: You can't adjust the preview bitrate for Meshcast-based streams
miscellaneous.you-not-yet-activated: Please wait until the director brings you into the room
miscellaneous.sample-rate-too-high: Your audio playback device has its sample rate set very high. If having audio issues, try using 48-kHz instead.
miscellaneous.no-network-details:
Network connection lost. 🤷‍♀️❌📶

Have you lost your Internet connection?
miscellaneous.enter-password-if-desired: Enter a password if provided, otherwise just click Cancel
